name: In Memory of Me
description:
Game Description

You return home, to your room. A room that is familar and a stranger. Coming home with amensia, not knowing anything about yourself, you try and figure out who you were before the accident.

A short solo project created during my third year in uni, it focuses on Level Design and Narrative design with additional audio.
Created in Unreal Engine 4 26.2

Controls:
WASD to move
Left click to interact
TAB to open inventory
Q and E to move in the inventory
ESC to  quit the inventory

Known bugs:
-Audio overlaps when you interact with more than one object, whilst audio plays

Third party Credits:

Simple Design Interior Props- Park Jong Myoung
Trophies and Rewards- SHOGUN GAMES LLP Mobile Phones- Iyoshko
